title: Can a woman wear & pray in clothes she wore during her menses before washing them? - assim al hakeem
transcript: Officer says can a girl wear clothes that she wore during her period before washing which has no stains on them and can she pray in such clothes the answer is everything on Earth is pure until proven otherwise so if a woman on her period wears clothes and then she takes them off or she becomes pure and she takes her Hustle her clothes are still pure we don't have any signs of impurity on them simply because she wore them while she was in the state of Menses does not impact the purity of her clothes at all and Allah Knows Best
